name: Hampton Inn York

reviews.title: A-1
reviews.text: Excellent hotel-staff was very accomodating and friendly,
rooms were very clean, and breakfast buffet and coffee bar was above and beyond the best. We are looking forward to staying again next year.
reviews.title: Lovely Except for the Bedbugs
Return a phone call?
reviews.text: Room was comfortable, breakfast was excellent, business center very well-equipped and all free, location perfect, lots of parking, nearby Texas Roadhouse was fun -- just one problem: a few days after getting home, lots of nasty little bites that didn't come from mosquitoes -- and then the horror of realizing that I had brought home BEDBUGS.

Management does not seem inclined to acknowledge or take responsibility for costs incurred in dealing with the problem. Neither I nor my briefcase and overnight bag had been anywhere else for many months. And I didn't have this problem before going to York.
reviews.title: Horrible Experience. Absolutely Unacceptable.
Nice - Great place to stay. Close to Harley Operations plant.
reviews.text: I am trying to arrange a block of rooms for out of town guests for my upcoming wedding. I have called this hotel on three separate occassions. Twice, over the two week period in which I called, I was given the voice mail of the sales coordinator. Having left voice mails both times I was very frustrated when I never received a response. On my third (and final) attempt I spoke directly with the manager who assured me that some mistake must have been made and that I would receive a phone call today. It is now nearly 7 pm and still no call. If this hotel cannot bother to return phone calls, I hold out little hope for their ability to accomodate my guests.

Stayed for a couple of nights on business, and as usual the Hampton Inn was great. Checkin, breakfast, internet, all work. It does not pretend to be a 5 star hotel, the hotel and staff are great at what they do. And with the Texas Roadhouse across the street what else couly you want!
reviews.title: Always the same - Great

reviews.text: This was a clean nice Hotel. Beds were very 'Fluffy' and comfortable. Right outside the York Galleria Mall. Nice staff. Wireless internet in each room no charge. Cannot complain at all. Breakfast included! Would stay here again. We stayed with a travel hockey team and everyone had a great time!
reviews.title: Just Fine!

reviews.text: As the travel person for our sports team, I am responsible for booking hotel rooms and finding things to do for our young people when we travel. Like everyone else I search the internet for good deals. We had to use the Housing Bureau to book our rooms for the Keystone Games we attended in York, PA. We decided on the Hampton Inn - York because of the breakfast, the pool, the mall and the restaurant next door. However, when I researched them on line I came upon this site with the information about the bed bugs. I was very surprised to see what had happened and I wanted to make sure our team would be staying at a good place. After doing some research about bed bugs, I called the manager of the hotel. She called me back. I asked her about the comments on trip advisor. She understood where I was coming from and she told me what they had done to take care of the issue. She told me it was not a cleanliness issue and that it was brought in by someone, and that they had done a lot of things at the hotel to get rid of them. She was very educated on the issue and I felt better after speaking with her. I had to take the time to write this because we had a wonderful stay. The hotel was very busy, but the staff was great. The housekeepers did a very good job with our rooms every day we were there. I loved the breakfast for our kids and the fact that the mall was so close by. I just wanted to say the hotel was clean, the staff was very nice and I don't think this hotel has any more issues with bed bugs.
reviews.title: Terrific Stay and Terrific Staff

reviews.text: I spent one night at the hotel with my family. Our requests for adjoining rooms was honored. The rooms and bathrooms were up to date, well-maintained and very clean. The rooms were not large, but that was to be expected for a Hampton Inn.
reviews.title: Very Pleasant Hampton Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was fine, consisting of eggs, sausage, bagels, donuts, cereals and other items that compose a continental breakfast. Coffee was particularly good.
reviews.title: Good Starting Point for Excursion

reviews.text: After being hired by a company in York, came here and stayed for about two weeks. Assigned first to room 431, after a few nights my companion had red, mosquito-like (only larger) VERY itchy spots popping up on hands, back, arms and eventually feet and buttocks. Thinking they were hives, we continued to stay in 431. However, when I also had red spots show up about a week after checking in, we asked housekeeping about it. We were told that there "may" have been one or two complaints in the past but that they had never "actually seen" any rash; I showed them mine and was sent to see the head housekeeper. This lady was extremely nice and immediately moved us into another room (436) across the hall so they "could investigate". She followed up with me to make sure the new room was okay, and even offered to reimburse us for any medications we had to purchase, but never told us that this was bedbugs. We bought Benadryl, hydrocortisone cream, Benadryl gel and finally FIVE boxes of baking soda, which we used to make a paste with water and put on the bite marks every night for several nights (this really helped). I spent hours on the computer researching the marks, and they are completely consistent with bedbug bites. The hotel is great, the staff is great, but this was extremely disturbing and personally a huge problem as the itching was so bad it was nearly impossible to sleep for several nights. Thankfully the bites seem to be going away now and no new ones.
reviews.title: Beautiful, but had a bedbug problem....

likes.liked: — The staff, and food were excellent

reviews.text: We stayed here in August , it was the 13th and the 14th, with our 3 daughters. We went straight to the Texas Road House next door before even checking in ~we loved it .A big Shopping Mall was also right there..
reviews.title: We will go back

reviews.text: The kids loved the pool. it wasn't big ,but it was nice~ pretty patio & CLEAN!!!
reviews.title: Very nice stay!!

reviews.text: That evening we heard that a concert would be going on, in the Huge community park across the way~ so we went ~ it was awesome . The band was "Pentagon" They played everything from The Eagles, to Cher... older stuff too. It 's a good park to take the kids to play also.
reviews.title: Nice stay

reviews.text: It was a bit of drive to Hershey park, which is why we were there,We went to Hershey on the 14th.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel/location is A+++

reviews.text: Typical Hampton room although bathroom in our unit needed some upgrading but other family members had newer fixtures. No indoor pool but small outdoor pool that was fine for the summer months and kids enjoyed in the evenings. Fitness center has 3 pieces of equipment I believe in good shape. Mall is adjacent to property. The biggest impression this location made on us was the breakfast. They had plenty of seating options and you could spread out even when they were completely full. The ladies working did their best to keep things clean and stocked. The waffle maker was a nice touch and they even made cinnamon rolls when asked. In the evening, there were a few games in lobby if you wanted to hang out and play.
reviews.title: Best Breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I always stay at this hotel when in York visiting my family. That staff is always friendly, professional and accommodating. Everyone from the front desk staff, to the breakfast ladies to everyone I see in housekeeping and maintenance, they are all kind and helpful. Breakfast is great with the new offering of waffles, not to mention all the other choices they have. It's always nice to be able to have free internet when traveling as well. Great location next to a steak house and the Galleria Mall. The rooms are also very clean and comfortable. I have no complaints only many thanks!
reviews.title: If you stay anywhere in York, there's no place but the Hampton Inn!

reviews.text: I have traveled for work, and stayed at the Hampton Inn in York Pa over the course of the last 2 months. I cannot express enough how much I have enjoyed my stays. The rooms are clean and well prepared, and the staff is excellent! During February 2010, two different times the city was basically shut down from record snowfall, and myself and co-workers were stuck at the hotel for the most part. The Hampton Team could not have handled a bad situation any better than they did. Catered food was brought to us, they helped everyone clean out vehicles from the heavy snow, and just really did one heck of a job to try and make a bad situation just a little better for all of us. When i am in York from this day forward, there are no other options where I will consider staying. What a great crew and wonderful hotel!
reviews.title: Excellence in Customer service would be an understatement.....

reviews.text: Our visit was during the 24" snow storm the first weekend of Feb . The hotel staff could not have been more hospitable during this trying time. We were stuck at the hotel from Fri. to Sun. The staff stayed at the hotel the entire snowstorm ,to help with serving hotel patrons who were stranded there. All roads , stores, etc. were closed . The manager walked to the Target store nearby to provide food for us since we could not get out to eat. They had snowplows going all day and night trying to clear the parking lots so people could get out when the storm stopped. I give this hotel an A+++++ for their service. In my book this hotel should be rated #1 in York. When my son goes to school there this fall we will for sure be staying here, and for many years to come . The staff at this hotel should be commended for their wonderful dedication to their jobs and customers.
reviews.title: wonderful hospitality

reviews.text: Sincerely,
reviews.title: Pleasant experience

description: The Hampton Inn – York features 144 beautifully re-appointed guest rooms, ranging from our standard double queen and upgraded king study to our specialty rooms. All accommodations include a bountiful hot breakfast buffet, free local calls, and over 60 television channels -some HD. For your relaxation, we feature an outdoor/heated pool and indoor fitness center. Located within a short walking distance of our hotel are five restaurants plus a food court at the mall for your dining convenience.
